EmailTemplate.subject: Book Your SpringOne Platform Travel Today
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
SpringOne Platform is just around the corner and we want you to be prepared. Start planning now to attend the conference, where you will have opportunities to connect, collaborate, and learn from fellow members of the Spring and cloud-native communities.
Start Planning Now: If you haven’t already, check out the travel page <[[https://springoneplatform.io/travel?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-hotel-q317]]> on the SpringOne Platform website. There you will find hotels with discounted rates, public and private transportation, parking information, registration check-in times, and more.
Discounted hotel rooms are limited and are expected to fill up quickly. Login <[[https://2017.springoneplatform.io/ehome/s1p/registration/edit?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-hotel-q317]]> to your SpringOne Platform account to book your hotel room today!
What to Expect at SpringOne Platform 2017:
- 200+ sessions <[[https://springoneplatform.io/sessions?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-hotel-q317]]> on everything from reactive programming to serverless, machine learning, event-driven architecture, microservices, and more - Pre-conference training <[[https://springoneplatform.io/training?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-hotel-q317]]> offering a series of hands-on, technical courses - Discounted hotel blocks offered at the Marriott Marquis, Intercontinental San Francisco, and Park Central Hotel - Lightning Talks <[[https://springoneplatform.io/lightning-talks?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-hotel-q317]]> to enlighten and inspire. What can you explain in 5 minutes? What would you share with the world? - An Open Space <[[https://springoneplatform.io/open-space?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-hotel-q317]]> setting that gets everyone’s creative energy flowing with fun after-hours experiences, including a Hub Night Out and Hub Social
Stay Connected: Join the conversation on Twitter <[[https://twitter.com/s1p]]>, using the hashtags #S1P and #SpringOne, and follow @s1p <[[https://twitter.com/s1p]]> for news and updates.
We look forward to seeing you in December!
The SpringOne Platform Team
